WINNERS.name: Late-Arriving Large Money (Follow Late NO)
WINNERS.recommendation: IMPLEMENT - This is a major new validated strategy
WINNERS.mechanism: Late-arriving large money (final 25% has 2x large trade ratio) betting NO = sharp money fading retail

WINNERS.name: Late-Arriving Large Money (Follow Late YES)
WINNERS.validation: LIKELY VALID but needs bucket analysis

PROMISING.name: Spread Widening Before Sharp Entry (Follow Sharp NO)
PROMISING.recommendation: Monitor but do not implement yet
PROMISING.note: The signal finds trades near high-NO-price buckets, which have positive edge anyway

PROMISING.name: Opening Move Reversal (Follow Reversal to NO)
PROMISING.validation: WEAK - P-value not significant, bucket ratio borderline

PROMISING.name: NCAAF Totals Specialist
PROMISING.recommendation: Monitor for more data, already known from Session 009

DEAD.name: Fibonacci Price Attractors
DEAD.issue: LOOK-AHEAD BIAS - used final_price which correlates with outcome (r=0.81)

DEAD.name: Size Distribution Shape Change
DEAD.note: Raw edge OK but flagged as FAIL due to small sample in second direction
DEAD.verdict: NEEDS INVESTIGATION - May have edge in one direction

DEAD.name: Category Momentum Contagion
DEAD.verdict: FAIL - Negative edge with large sample = definitively rejected

DEAD.name: Extreme Public Sentiment Fade
DEAD.verdict: FAIL - Negative edge, contrary to sports betting intuition

DEAD.name: Trade Count Milestone Fading
DEAD.verdict: FAIL - Negative edge (LSD idea was correctly flagged as noise)

DEAD.name: Bot Signature Fade
DEAD.verdict: FAIL - No signals detected with CV < 0.3

DEAD.name: Multi-Outcome Pricing Inconsistency
DEAD.verdict: SKIPPED - Requires market metadata not available in trade data

priority_1.strategy: SPORTS-007: Late-Arriving Large Money (Follow Late NO)
priority_1.notes: This is an excellent independent signal. Signal fires when final 25% of trades has 2x the large trade ratio as earlier trades, and late large trades favor NO. Bet NO.

priority_2.strategy: SPORTS-007b: Late-Arriving Large Money (Follow Late YES)
priority_2.notes: Same mechanism but betting YES. May be valid but needs proper baseline comparison.

priority_3.notes: Known from Session 009, sample size increasing

KEY_LEARNINGS.sports_betting_translation: Most sports betting concepts did NOT translate well to Kalshi. Steam moves, public fades, and category contagion all failed.
KEY_LEARNINGS.what_worked: Late money following (SPORTS-007) is the one clear winner - the sports betting principle that 'sharps bet late' does appear to work.
KEY_LEARNINGS.methodology_bugs: SPORTS-015 had look-ahead bias (using final_price to determine bet direction). Always verify signals don't use future information.
KEY_LEARNINGS.lsd_mode_value: Rapid screening correctly flagged SPORTS-015's 33% edge as suspicious, leading to bug discovery.
